286060.「おや あなたは……\n 地上の英雄 <pc>さん ですね。\n 僕はオルガノさ:
Oh, you must be... , the champion from the surface world. My name is Soyle, and I am an assistant to Mr. Organo.
I'm currently researching the Goddess Trees, but I'm at a loss on how to find the materials needed for them to grow...
You seem like you're quite strong... If I may ask, could you do me a favor on behalf of Mr. Organo?

286061.「こんにちは <pc>さん！\n 話は オルガノさんから うかがっています。\n:
Hello, ! Mr. Organo told me all about you.
Have you heard of something called a "Goddess Tree"?
A Goddress Tree is a mysterious plant that is said give power to those who grow it. However, no one has been able to do it...
It's said that the key to nuturing it lies in something called a "Geneseed".
So then, ! Would you be willing to help me grow them? I'll do everything in my power to assist you!

286062.「そ そうですか……。それは残念です。\n もし <pc>さんの気が変わったら\:
I...I see... that's a shame. Well, if you
change your mind, please come talk to me
again.

286063.「わあっ ありがとうございます！\n では 研究用の庭を お貸しするので\n 扱:
Wow! Thank you so much! Now, I'm going to
lend you my research garden. I'll show you
how to use it.

286068.「<pc>さん。\n 女神の木のことなら 僕になんでも\n 聞いてください！\n:
<pc>. If you have any questions about
the Goddess Trees, please do not hesitate
to ask!
<bw_break>

286069.「あっ 聞いてください <pc>さん！ \n どうやら 女神の木が 時間を経て\:
Ah, , please listen! It seems that the Goddess Trees change over time, allowing for further growth.
The tree's biology is quite interesting, isn't it? Yes, yes... Let's go ahead and start growing for today! Now then...

286070.「さあ 何を ご希望ですか？\n<select_se_off>\n育てる\n庭の:
So, what can I do for you?
<select_se_off>
Grow
Change Garden Appearance
Review Growing
Explanation
<select_end>
<close>

286071.「さあ 何を ご希望ですか？\n<select_se_off>\n育てる\n育て:
So, what can I do for you?
<select_se_off>
Grow
Review Growing
Explanation
<select_end>
<close>

286072.「また いつでも 来てくださいね。\n <pc>さん！\n<end>:
You're welcome to come back any time,
<pc>!
<end>

286073.「どの 女神の木を 育てますか？\n<end>:
Which Goddess Tree do you want to grow?
<end>

286074.「すべての女神の木が 最大まで成長しているので\n 現在の 女神の木の状態を お:
Since all of the Goddess Trees are at their
growth maximum, I'll show you how they're
looking right now.
<end>

286075.「ああっ すみません。\n 今は <%sM_TREE_NAME>を これ以上\n:
Ah, I'm sorry. It seems that <%sM_TREE_NAME>
can't grow any further.
<end>

286076.「<%sM_TREE_NAME>は\n レベル<%nM_BEFORE_LEVEL:
<%sM_TREE_NAME> is in the process of growing from Lv. <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL> to Lv. <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL>.
I apologize, but I can't make it grow any further until this process finishes. Please wait a little longer!

286077.「では 素材を お預かりしますね。\n ここに こうして…。\n<end>:
Okay, I'll take your materials. Just put these
here...
<end>

286078.「あれっ……？\n 残念ですが 成長に必要な素材が\n 足りないみたいです。\n:
Huh? I'm afraid you don't have enough
materials to start growing.
<end>

286080.<color_yellow>\n成長後に メニューを開きなおすことで\n最新情報:
<color_yellow>If you open this menu again after growing,
it will be updated with the latest
information.<end>

286081.「ふう…。これであとは 育ち終わるのを\n 待つばかりです！\n 他に どの女神:
Phew... Now all we have to do is wait for it
to finish growing! Any other Goddess Trees
that you'd like to grow?
<end>

286082.「どの見た目を 変更しますか？\n<end>:
Which appearance do you want to change?
<end>

286083.「<%sM_THEME_NAME>の見た目は どれにしますか？\n<end>:
Which appearance would you like
the <%sM_THEME_NAME> to have?
<end>

286085.「ふう……。\n 『<%sM_PARTS_NAME>』を 取りつけました！\n:
Phew... I've changed it to <%sM_PARTS_NAME>!
This <%sM_THEME_NAME> is quite nice, don't
you agree?
<me 71><bw_break>

286086.「何について 聞きたいですか？\n<select_se_off>\n女神の木とは:
What would you like me to explain?
<select_se_off>
The Goddess Trees
Growth Materials
Garden Rank
Garden Creatures
<select_end>
<break>

286087.「この庭には 『女神の木』と呼ばれる木の苗が\n 全部で１０本 植えられています:
In this garden, there are ten seedlings of trees called "Goddess Trees".
The Goddess Trees are said to give power to those who grow them. That power depends on which tree is grown.
For example, growing the Strong Tree increases your Strength, and growing the Hardy Tree increases your Resilience.

286088.「これまでの研究によって\n 女神の木を育てるには パニガルムで手に入る\n 『:
Based on my research, I've concluded that in order for the Goddess Trees to grow, I need "Geneseeds" that come from Panigalm.
If you bring me any, I'll give them to the trees to help them grow. Please bring me as many as you can!

286089.「複数の女神の木が 全体的に成長していくと\n 研究用の庭 それ自体のランクが上:
As the number of multiple Goddess Trees grow overall, the research garden's rank itself increases. I call this its "Garden Rank".
It seems as the Garden Rank increases, the soil becomes more fertile, allowing trees that hit their limit to grow even further.
In other words, it's a good idea to try to grow all of your Goddess Trees in a balanced manner!

286090.「……あれっ？\n どうやら <%sM_TREE_NAME>に\n 何か変化が:
...Huh? It looks like the <%sM_TREE_NAME>
has changed somehow.
<end>

286091.<%sM_TREE_NAME>が\nレベル<%nM_BEFORE_LEVEL>か:
The <%sM_TREE_NAME> has grown from Lv. <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL>
to Lv. <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL> and your <%sM_KOUKA_NAME>
increases by <%dM_KOUKA_NUM>!

286092.「女神の木が 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
A Goddess Tree has grown and it seems like you've gotten stronger, ! ...Huh?
Looks like the garden has changed!

286093.<pipipi_off>\n庭ランクが <%nM_BEFORE_RANK>から:
Garden Rank increases from Rank <%dM_BEFORE_RANK> to Rank <%dM_AFTER_RANK>!
The Goddess Trees' level limit increases from Lv. <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL> to Lv. <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL>!

286094.「わあっ どうやら 庭ランクが上がったことで\n 『<%sM_THEME_NAM:
Looks like the <%sM_THEME_NAME> appearance can
now be changed thanks to the Garden Rank
increasing!
<bw_break>

286095.「女神の木が 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
A Goddess Tree has grown and it seems like you've gotten stronger, ! At this rate... Huh?
It seems all of the trees have grown splendidly! Way to go, ! You're amazing!

286096.「女神の木が 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
A Goddess Tree has grown and I can see that
you've gotten even stronger, <pc>!
Please keep up the good work!
<bw_break>

286097.「ああっ なんと……\n すべての女神の木が 最大まで成長しました。\n もう:
Oh, my...! All of the Goddess Trees have grown to their maximum. They can't grow any more!
I never thought the day would come where I'd see all of the Goddess Trees fully grown with my own eyes... I'm so happy!
It's all thanks to your efforts, . We raised them together, and I can't thank you enough for your help.
As always, if you'd like to change the garden's appearance, please come and see me!

286098.「でも 僕の見立てでは 女神の木は まだまだ\n 成長する可能性を 秘めているは:
The way I see it, the Goddess Trees still have a lot of potential for growth...
Please be patient until the Goddess Trees reach their next stages of growth!

287476.「<%sM_TREE_NAME>を\n レベル<%nM_BEFORE_LEVEL:
You want to grow the <%sM_TREE_NAME> from Lv. <%dM_BEFORE_LEVEL> to Lv. <%dM_AFTER_LEVEL>?
Seems like it will take about <%dL_HOUR> <%sL_HOUR_UNIT> <%dL_MIN> <%sL_MIN_UNIT> to grow. Is that all right?

288314.「おや すでに同じものを 取りつけていますよ。\n<end>:
Ah, looks like you're already using this one.
<end>

288597.「ふう……。\n <%sM_THEME_NAME>を 元の状態に戻しました！\n:
Phew... The <%sM_THEME_NAME> was restored to
its original look!
<me 71><bw_break>

288601.「……あれ？ 何か おかしいですね。\n ちょっと 問題が起きているみたいです。:
...Huh? Something's not quite right. There
seems to be some kind of problem. Please
come back in a little while!
<end>

288719.「もう一度 女神の木の育て方を\n おさらいするのですね。わかりました！\n<b:
You'd like to go over how to grow the Goddess
Trees? Understood!
<bw_break>

288810.「研究用の庭には 不思議な生き物が\n 住み着いているようです。\n あれは い:
Looks like a strange creature has taken a liking to the research garden... I wonder what that's all about...?
Mr. Organo was wary that it might be a monster trying to destroy the garden, but I think it's just a spirit watching over the Goddess Trees.
More than anything...just look how cute and fluffy it is! I love the way it moves around! Don't you think so too, ?

288867.「おや 源世植物研究所へ ようこそ。\n 僕はここで ある植物の研究をしているの:
Hello, welcome to the World Botany Research. I'm doing some research on a plant here, but it's not going so well...
Oh... is there a strong adventurer out there brave enough to traverse Panigalm...?

<yesno><close>

Do you want to leave the <%sM_THEME_NAME>
look as it is for now?
<yesno><close>

289186.「わかりました！ 『庭の見た目を変える』から\n 庭の見た目を いつでも変えられ:
Understood! You can change the look of your
garden at any time by choosing "Change Garden
Appearance". Please let me know!
<bw_break>

327753.「どの 精霊を 育てますか？\n<end>:
Which spirit do you want to raise?
<end>

327754.「すべての精霊が 最大まで成長しているので\n 現在の精霊の状態を お見せします:
All spirits are at their highest potential
right now. I'll show you their current status.
<end>

327755.「あとは 順調に育ってくれるのを\n 願うばかりですね！\n 他に どの精霊を:
Now we just have to hope it grows well!
Any other spirits you'd like to grow?
<end>

327756.「あの 不思議な生き物たちについて\n 新たに わかったことがあります。\n<b:
I've learned something new about those mysterious creatures.
They've been around for a long, long time and are called "Abysspirits". I have no doubts they are protectors of the Goddess Trees.
After some further investigation, I found that there are three types of spirits, each with a different role.
Looking closely, you can see they do all sorts of things. I could just watch them forever!

327761.「どちらを 育てますか？\n<end>:
Which do you want to grow?
<end>

327762.「精霊たちが 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
An Abysspirit has grown and it seems like you've gotten stronger, ! ...Huh?
They've all grown marvelously! I knew I could count on you, !

327763.「精霊たちが 成長して <pc>さんも\n さらに 強くなったみたいですね！\n:
An Abysspirit has grown and it seems like
you've gotten stronger too, <pc>!
Keep up the amazing work!
<bw_break>

327764.「ああっ なんと……\n すべての精霊が 最大まで成長しました。\n もう これ:
Oh, my...! All of the spirits have grown to their maximum potential. They can't grow any more!
And it's all because of your efforts. You've raised each one with so much care! Thank you so very much!
If you ever want to see how the spirits are doing, you're always welcome to come and see me!

327765.「僕の見立てでは この精霊たちは\n まだ成長する可能性を 秘めていそうです。\:
To be honest, I think these spirits still have the potential to grow higher than they're able to now.
Please be patient and wait until they're able to start growing again!
